## ğŸ·ï¸ Labels Taxonomy

### Priority Labels (3)
```
ğŸ”´ priority:must     - Critical for demo success, MUST be completed
ğŸŸ¡ priority:should   - Important but not critical, complete if time permits
ğŸŸ¢ priority:could    - Nice to have, defer if needed
```

### Type Labels (6)
```
ğŸŸ£ backend    - Backend API, database, core logic
ğŸ”µ frontend   - UI, UX, display interfaces
ğŸ”· infra      - Infrastructure, deployment, configuration
ğŸ’  ux         - User experience improvements
ğŸ“˜ docs       - Documentation, guides, briefings
ğŸ¬ demo       - Demo-specific preparation
```

### Owner Labels (3)
```
ğŸ‘¤ owner:A    - Student A (Core backend, ASR, alignment, reliability)
ğŸ‘¤ owner:B    - Student B (Frontend, UX, live display, admin workflows)
ğŸ‘¤ owner:C    - Student C (Documentation, analytics, stakeholder engagement)
```

### Status Labels (3)
```
ğŸ›¡ï¸ stability  - System reliability and error handling
âœ¨ polish     - UI/UX refinements and visual improvements
ğŸ› bug        - Bug fixes
```

## ğŸ¬ Demo Success Criteria

Sprint is successful when:

```
âœ… System Stability
   â”œâ”€ No crashes during full demo cycle
   â”œâ”€ Graceful handling of ASR drops
   â”œâ”€ Stable WebSocket connections
   â””â”€ Proper error logging

âœ… Demo Readiness
   â”œâ”€ Demo scripts prepared (5-min and 10-min)
   â”œâ”€ UI polished and professional
   â”œâ”€ Masjid briefing documents finalized
   â””â”€ Lab simulation completed with feedback

âœ… Core Functionality
   â”œâ”€ Upload â†’ Vet â†’ Live stream pipeline works
   â”œâ”€ Subtitle display accurate and smooth
   â”œâ”€ Skipped segments handled correctly
   â””â”€ Bulk approval feature working

âœ… Stakeholder Preparation
   â”œâ”€ Engagement plan documented
   â”œâ”€ Analytics ready for post-demo review
   â””â”€ Team confident in delivery
```

---

## ğŸ“… Suggested Timeline

```
Day 1-2: FOUNDATION
â”œâ”€ Create project board and labels
â”œâ”€ Assign issues to team members
â”œâ”€ Begin priority:must issues
â””â”€ Team alignment meeting

Day 3-4: CORE DEVELOPMENT
â”œâ”€ Focus on backend stability (A1-A3)
â”œâ”€ Implement frontend features (B1, B4)
â”œâ”€ Draft documentation (C1, C3)
â””â”€ Daily standup check-ins

Day 5: INTEGRATION & TESTING
â”œâ”€ End-to-end pipeline testing (A3)
â”œâ”€ Lab simulation (C5)
â”œâ”€ Collect feedback
â””â”€ Address critical bugs

Day 6: POLISH & REFINEMENT
â”œâ”€ UI/UX improvements (B2, B3)
â”œâ”€ Enhanced logging (A4)
â”œâ”€ Analytics setup (C2)
â””â”€ Stakeholder engagement prep (C4)

Day 7: FINAL PREPARATION
â”œâ”€ Demo rehearsal with full team
â”œâ”€ Documentation review
â”œâ”€ Final bug fixes
â””â”€ Go/No-Go decision
```

---

## âš ï¸ Critical Constraints

### Scope Freeze Policy
```
âŒ NO new features unless required to prevent demo failure
âŒ NO architecture changes
âŒ NO scope creep or gold-plating
âŒ NO "while we're at it" additions

âœ… Bug fixes for existing functionality
âœ… Polish and refinement of current features
âœ… Demo preparation and documentation
âœ… Stability and error handling improvements
```

### Decision Framework
```
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚ Is this fixing a broken feature?    â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
            â”‚
    â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
    â”‚ YES            â”‚ NO
    â†“                â†“
âœ… APPROVE     Is it required for demo?
                     â”‚
              â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
              â”‚ YES         â”‚ NO
              â†“             â†“
        Can we work      âŒ DEFER
        around it?      to post-sprint
              â”‚
       â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
       â”‚ YES         â”‚ NO
       â†“             â†“
   âŒ DEFER      âš ï¸ ESCALATE
   (workaround)   to team lead
```

---

## ğŸ” Issue Details Summary

### Must-Have Issues (9) ğŸ”´

| ID | Title | Owner | Type | Focus |
|----|-------|-------|------|-------|
| A1 | Graceful ASR Handling | A | backend, stability | System doesn't crash on ASR drops |
| A2 | Cache and Buffering | A | backend, stability | Smooth subtitle delivery |
| A3 | End-to-End Safety | A | backend, stability | Full pipeline tested |
| B1 | Bulk Approve Action | B | frontend, ux | Streamline vetting workflow |
| B4 | Skipped Segment Fix | B | frontend, bug | Display skipped segments correctly |
| B5 | Demo UI Preparation | B | frontend, demo | All UIs demo-ready |
| C1 | Masjid Briefing Docs | C | docs, demo | Committee understands system |
| C3 | Demo Script | C | docs, demo | 5-min and 10-min versions |
| C5 | Lab Simulation | C | docs, demo | Test with Malay speakers |

### Should-Have Issues (5) ğŸŸ¡

| ID | Title | Owner | Type | Focus |
|----|-------|-------|------|-------|
| A4 | Enhanced Logging | A | backend, stability | Better debugging and analytics |
| B2 | Subtitle Animation | B | frontend, polish | Professional fade-in effects |
| B3 | Visual Design Polish | B | frontend, polish, ux | Less generic, more masjid-appropriate |
| C2 | Post-Service Analytics | C | backend, docs, demo | Track system performance |
| C4 | Stakeholder Engagement | C | docs, demo | VC, Dean, Committee outreach |

### Deferred Issues (1) ğŸŸ¢

| ID | Title | Owner | Type | Status |
|----|-------|-------|------|--------|
| A5 | Model Retraining Docs | A | backend, docs | Frozen - Post-Sprint |

> 
> **"Perfect is the enemy of done."**
> 
> **"Focus on demo readiness, not perfection."**
